Text.Page: In due course, our union will deliver enlightenment to every corner of the world.
I sense great turmoil in you. Please take your darkness elsewhere.
Only through enlightenment can we make the world a better place!
Others may see strife and conflict as the path to unification, but the Enlightened Union seeks unity through peace and wisdom.
All it takes to unite disparate people is understanding.
How can bringing harmony to all people be seen as an act of aggression?
It is as though the entire world is holding its breath, waiting to see whether enlightenment will triumph over savagery and self-interest.
